headline: Stock Market Today: Dow Jones Rises On U.S.-Canada Trade News (Live Coverage)
summary: Stock Market Today: The Dow Jones index rallied 240 points Monday on U.S.-Canada trade news after Trump suspended trade talks Friday.

headline: Why The Trade Desk (TTD) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of advertising software maker The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) jumped 5.1% in the morning session after the stock continued its positive momentum following an upgrade from Evercore.
